ing: 1/2 English cucumber, quartered and thinly sliced
1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "A refreshing side dish to pair with chicken, pork, or beef."
ins: Mix tomatoes, cucumber, red bell pepper, onion, parsley, lime juice, olive oil, green onions, cilantro, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Let stand at room temperature until flavors combine, about 3 hours.
